import './intro.scss' import KeyboardArrowDownIcon from '@mui/icons-material/KeyboardArrowDown'; import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react' import { init } from 'ityped' export default function Intro() { const textRef = useRef(); useEffect(()=>{ init(textRef.current,{ showCursor: true, strings: ["Software Developer", "Student", "Artist"], }) },[]) return (

Hi there! I'm

Shir Nava

Freelance

) }
